MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G75 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Blenheim and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:55pm. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:30pm on the 9th November 2020
